CustomField.formula: IF( $RecordType.Name = "Frontier Services Agreement", NULL, IF( AND ( RecordType.Name ="Product Schedule", (vlocity_cmt__QuoteId__r.vlocity_cmt__RecurringTotal__c >0), Contract_Auto_Number__c != NULL ), Contract_Auto_Number__c, IF( AND( RecordType.Name ="Product Schedule", (vlocity_cmt__QuoteId__r.vlocity_cmt__RecurringTotal__c >0), Contract_Auto_Number__c == NULL ), vlocity_cmt__QuoteId__r.Schedule_Number__c, "S-00"+ ContractNumber ) ) )
CustomField.label: Schedule ID
